text: Päivi Aulikki Aaltonen is a retired archer from Finland. She was born on 12 December 1952. Aaltonen competed at the 1980 Summer Olympics, 1984 Summer Olympics, and the 1988 Summer Olympics.Päivi Meriluoto-AaltonenPaivi MERILUOTO-AALTONEN == References == Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Finnish archers Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Finland Category:Sportspeople from Tampere
title: Päivi Meriluoto
